New York City is bracing for a hybrid storm bringing major coastal flooding, while temperatures are set to drop significantly over the holiday weekend; meanwhile, the city is also addressing public safety concerns with new regulations and initiatives in education, housing, and transportation.

### Risks & Alerts

- Major coastal flooding expected in NYC due to hybrid storm; prepare for hazardous conditions. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Expect cold and wet weather for the holiday weekend in NYC and NJ; plan accordingly. [Read](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinwFBVV95cUxQb2dhTkcwNnBCeHRyc3hrRjJyYmN1OW9PX2FCU190ZTZiM0NKQVpoc0RFMV9DMlFYcmtwM1hrekdXMVJPYklIQ3NybEFmZndvS21ITDNtMUR2OXFMZXV1c0Q5Z2F4anBDNjRnazNmUXZmTW1YcU1CR2x5bHN1WHpFNFJIVXE3UEJfSWp0WWw4aEVsajlPMHF3ajhhQlY5Y00?oc=5)
- Temperatures in NYC set to drop significantly; prepare for colder conditions. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
